Heritage () is a 1984 Yugoslavian drama film directed by Matjaž Klopčič. It was screened in the Un Certain Regard section at the 1985 Cannes Film Festival.
Cast
* Ivo Ban - Viktor
* Polde Bibič
* Bine Matoh
* Bernarda Oman
* Boris Ostan
* Radko Polič
* Majda Potokar - Mila
* Milena Zupančič
